title: Eurail says stolen traveler data now up for sale on dark web
description: Eurail B.V., the operator that provides access to 250,000 kilometers of European railways, confirmed that data stolen in a breach earlier this year is being off

content.summary: Eurail B.V., the operator that provides access to 250,000 kilometers of European railways, confirmed that data stolen in a breach earlier this year is being offered for sale on the dark web. [...]...
content.impact: The implications of this cybersecurity update are significant for digital infrastructure in Tier-1 nations. Experts suggest that such developments could influence both consumer behavior and enterprise-level security protocols in the US, UK, CA, and AU markets.
